subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: A vast early breakaway stood the Giro d'Italia bike race on its head Wednesday as the top five leaders overnight finished nearly 13 minutes behind the winner and tumbled down the standings.
snippet: A vast early breakaway stood the Giro d'Italia bike race on its head Wednesday as the top five leaders overnight finished nearly 13 minutes behind the winner and tumbled down the standings.
